sentences.sContent: Lifting electromagnet is a kind of lifting gear.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lifting electromagnet is a kind of lifting gear.
sentences.sCn: 起重电磁铁是起重工具的一种。

sentences.sContent: Is the key to control the hydraulic part, this system is through PLC control electromagnet of solenoid valve, to achieve control of the manipulator's action.
sentences.sContent_eng: Is the key to control the hydraulic part, this system is through PLC control electromagnet of solenoid valve, to achieve control of the manipulator's action.
sentences.sCn: 液压部分是控制的关键所在，本系统是通过PLC控制电磁阀的电磁铁，从而实现对机械手各动作的控制。

sentences.sContent: Metallurgical hoist, electric hoist, chain hoist, chain hoists, trolleys, grab, electric flat car, lifting electromagnet, hand hoist, sling, Jack, hoist, bearing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Metallurgical hoist, electric hoist, chain hoist, chain hoists, trolleys, grab, electric flat car, lifting electromagnet, hand hoist, sling, Jack, hoist, bearing.
sentences.sCn: 电动葫芦，冶金葫芦，环链葫芦，手拉葫芦，单轨小车，抓斗，电动平车，起重电磁铁，手扳葫芦，吊索具，千斤顶，卷扬机，轴承。

trans.tranOther: a piece of metal that becomes magnetic(= able to attract metal objects ) when an electric current is turned on
